text:
[Verse]
Motor rumble feel it strong
Headlights cuttin' through the dark
Empty highway all night long
Gonna chase the morning spark

[Verse 2]
Wind is howlin' through my hair
Speedin’ faster engine’s roar
Nothin' but the midnight air
Freedom's callin' from the core

[Chorus]
On a midnight ride
Under stars we glide
No place to hide
On this wild ride

[Verse 3]
Neon signs flash left and right
City lights they blur the line
But we're racing through the night
Every mile a dream is mine

[Bridge]
Road is endless wheels keep turnin'
Every curve my heart is yearnin'
For a destination far
Guided by the shining star

[Chorus]
On a midnight ride
Under stars we glide
No place to hide
On this wild ride
title: Midnight Ride
